title: EpicCraftingsPlus 史诗合成插件配置问题
txt_content:
EpicCraftingsPlus 如题
  Crafts:
    super_sword:
      id: DIAMOND_SWORD
      name: '&4&lSuper Sword'
      lore:
      - '&6This is one of the best'
      - '&6swords on the server!'
      - ''
      - '&8[Created by: &c%player%&8]'
      category: weapons_armor
      enchants:
      - DAMAGE_ALL;6
      - FIRE_ASPECT;3
      requires:
      - DIAMOND;15;&bUnique Diamond;&7A legendary mineral;&7very hard to obtain..
      - IRON_INGOT;10
      permission: ecraft.supersword
      one-time: true
      cooldown: 1800
      hide-flags:
      - HIDE_ATTRIBUTES
      extra-requires:
      - level,15,take
      commands-when-crafted:
      - broadcast &2&l%player% crafted a &4&lSUPER SWORD&2&l!

如何配置合成的成功率 两个搬运贴我看了没有介绍 晕了

replies.author: MisakaFish
replies.txt_content:
https://www.spigotmc.org/resourc ... fts-1-8-1-14.39967/#You can add a probability of success to the item. For example, if is set to 25 that means that there will be a 75% of chance to fail, and lose the used items.
success-rate: 25

这个是配置成功率的

我叫下冰雹 发表于 2019-10-25 14:17
success-rate:
万分感谢
